verses.1: Benjamin pen a tacil Bela, a nihna Ashbel, a thumna Aharah,
verses.2: a lina Nohah le a ngana Rafa-teʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.5: Gera, Shefufan le Huram ahi uh hi.
verses.6: Ehudʼ tapate (amaute pen Geba-a teeng beh lutangte hi uh a, amaute Manahath ah galmatin kipua hi):
verses.7: Naaman, Ahijah le Uzza le Ahihudʼ pa Heglam a kici Gera ahi uh hi.
verses.8: Shaharaim in a zite Hushim le Baara a mak khit ciangin Moab gam sungah tapate nei hi.
verses.9: Amah in a zikik Hodesh tawh a neih a tapate: Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malkam,
verses.10: Jeuz, Sakhia le Mirmah ahi uh hi. Hihte pen amau beh sungah innkuan lutangte ahi uh hi.
verses.11: Amah in Hushim tawh zong a neih a tapate: Ahitub le Elpaal ahi uh hi.
verses.12: Elpaalʼ tapate: Eber, Misham le Ono le Lod a khuapite tawh a sat Shemed,
verses.13: le Beriah le Shema (Gath a teengte a taisak Aijalon a teeng beh lutangte),
verses.14: le Ahio, Shashak le Jeremoth ahi uh hi.
verses.16: Mikhael, Ishpah le Joha-te pen Beriahʼ tapate ahi uh hi.
verses.18: Ishmerai, Izliah le Jobab-te pen Elpaalʼ suante ahi uh hi.
verses.21: Adaiah, Beraiah le Shimrath-te pen Shimeiʼ suante ahi uh hi.
verses.25: Ifdeiah le Penuel-te pen Shashakʼ suante ahi uh hi.
verses.27: Jaareshiah, Elijah le Zikri te pen Jehoramʼ suante ahi uh hi.
verses.28: Hihte pen amau khang tawh kizui-in beh lutangte, a ukpite ahi uh hi. Hihte khempeuh Jerusalem ah a teeng uh hi.
verses.29: Gibeon khuapi a sat pa Jeiel pen Gibeon ah teeng a, ama ziʼ min Maakah ahi hi.
verses.30: Ama tapa upa pen Abdon, tua ciangin Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
verses.32: le Mikloth (amah pen Shimeahʼ pa) ahi hi. Tu-in amauʼ suanlekhakte zong Jerusalem-a amauʼ behteʼ gal khat ah amauʼ behte mah tawh teeng uh hi.
verses.33: Ner pen Kishʼ pa, Kish pen Saulʼ pa ahi hi. Saul pen Jonathan, Malkhishua, Abinadab le Eshbaalʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.34: Tua ciangin Jonathanʼ tapa pen Meribbaal hi a, Meribbaal pen Mikahʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.35: Mikahʼ tapate: Pithon, Melek, Tarea le Ahaz ahi uh hi.
verses.36: Ahaz pen Jehoaddahʼ pa ahi hi. Jehoaddah pen Alemeth, Azmaveth, le Zimriʼ pa hi a, Zimri pen Mozaʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.37: Moza pen Bineaʼ pa ahi hi. Bineaʼ tapa Rafah, a tapa Eleasah, a tapa Azel ahi hi.
verses.38: Azel in tapa guk nei a, tuateʼ minte: Azrikam, Bokheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah le Hanan ahi uh hi. Hihte khempeuh Azelʼ tapate ahi uh hi.
verses.39: Azelʼ sanggampa Eshekʼ tapate: A tacil Ulam, a nihna Jeush le a thumna Elifelet ahi hi.
verses.40: Ulamʼ tapate a thahat galhangte, thal tawite, tapa tampi le tupa tampi a neite hi a, mi za le sawm nga pha uh hi. Hihte khempeuh Benjamin minamte ahi uh hi.
